docs.snippet: IS it possible in the wake of the Second Festival of Latin American Music at Caracas  to form an opinion of the status of musical lift in the vast areas south of our borders? Ob  viously not. But if one restricts the discussion to composition, one...
docs.lead_paragraph: IS it possible in the wake of the Second Festival of Latin American Music at Caracas to form an opinion of the status of musical lift in the vast areas south of our borders? Ob viously not. But if one restricts the discussion to composition, one can hazard some generalizations.

docs.snippet: DALLAS, April 15 (AP)--Wiffi  Smith of St. Clair, Mich., just four months on the women's golf tour, won her first tournament today with a stretch run that gave here first money in the $7,500 Dallas Open.
docs.lead_paragraph: DALLAS, April 15 (AP)--Wiffi Smith of St. Clair, Mich., just four months on the women's golf tour, won her first tournament today with a stretch run that gave here first money in the $7,500 Dallas Open.

docs.snippet: LAS VEGAS, Nev., April 20 --Gene Littler shot a 3-underpar 69 today in a bid to capture his third straight $40,000 Tournament of Champions golf tourney.
